attributes.action: Deport Micheal Gorton for wearing flip flops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My mate Mikey wears flip flops in all sorts of weather. It just isn't right. Flip flops are for the beach or pregnant ladies. Mikey qualifys for neither

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
